facts_section.title: Interesting Facts About Dogs
facts: Dogs have a unique 'nose print' — the pattern on the nose is individual, like a human fingerprint.
A dog's hearing reaches ultrasound up to ~45 kHz — that's why we can't hear dog whistles.
Vibrissae work as sensors for distance and air flow — helping navigate in the dark.

items.question: Can I trust the materials?
items.answer: We compile information from verified sources and practice, but this is not a substitute for an in-person vet/trainer visit.

items.question: Can I suggest edits?
items.answer: Yes, send suggestions — we continuously improve our materials.

items.question: Will there be new breeds?
items.answer: Yes, we regularly add breed profiles — stay tuned for updates.
